This file records the port numbers used by our client programs.
A new client program will find a port number that is not in this list and then add that number to this list:
40000
40000
40001
40001
40002
40002
40003
40004
40005
40006
40007
40007
40007
40007
40007
40008
40009
40009
40009
40010
40011
40012
40013
40014
40015
40016
40017
40018
40018
40019
40020
40021
40022
